message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire a product that holds significant value to me. Considering its worth and your potential interest, I am offering you the chance to purchase this item at a special price of $9,500. This offer is tailored to ensure a fair exchange while maximizing the value for both parties involved. Should you be interested in proceeding with this offer, please let me know promptly so we can finalize the details. Thank you for considering this unique opportunity.
